text: Fuldera is a village and former municipality of the district of Inn in the canton of Graubünden in Switzerland. On 1 January 2009, the former municipalities of Fuldera, Lü, Müstair, Santa Maria Val Müstair, Tschierv and Valchava merged into the municipality of Val Müstair. Category:Villages in Graubünden Category:Former municipalities of Graubünden
title: Fuldera
